item.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
item.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

item.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'extortion' over seizure of oil tankers
item.description: An emergency meeting of the UN Security Council was called to discuss the US seizure of two tankers.

item.title: Libya's army chief killed in air crash in Turkey
item.description: Signal was earlier lost with a jet that took off from Ankara with Gen Mohammed Ali Ahmed al-Haddad and four others on board.

item.title: Border villagers abducted and taken to Russia, says Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine has tried to evacuate areas of Sumy region near the Russian border, but many civilians have refused to leave.

item.title: At least two dead in Pennsylvania nursing home explosion
item.description: Five people are still unaccounted for but crews have rescued multiple people from the partially collapsed building, officials say.
